entry.title: [Oakland] The Beep Boop (NW)
entry.summary: Back in August, I wrote a review for the button at the northeast corner of Forbes Ave and Morewood Avenue. The northeast corner is not the most frequented corner, but the northwest and southeast corners are. I’m now back with a review for the northwest corner! entry.title: The Point
entry.summary: Last Sunday, I decided to go downtown on a whim because it was a really nice day outside. I brought along my parents’ old Nikon FM film camera since I hadn’t taken many photos with it yet. I got some nice pics of the architecture before heading to Point State Park. Point State Park is … Continue reading "The Point"

entry.title: [Oakland] Blessing St at Bloomfield Blvd (SW)
entry.summary: Hey yinz! This is Katherine’s roommate, Bobbie, with a special guest crosswalk review. entry.title: [Squirrel Hill] Murray Ave × Beacon St (SW)
entry.summary: I passed this button on Labor Day on the way to get dinner at Sichuan Gourmet (because only Chinese restaurants are open on holidays 😝). entry.title: Football on the … South Side?
entry.summary: Last Saturday was a Pirates game and also a Steelers preseason game. But because we’re cool and hipster and all, my roomie and I went to a Riverhounds soccer game instead. The Pittsburgh Riverhounds are Western Pennsylvania’s only professional soccer team. They play in the United Soccer League (the level under Major League Soccer) and … Continue reading "Football on the … South Side?"

entry.title: [South Shore] E Carson St × Smithfield St (S)

link.title: [South Shore] E Carson St × Smithfield St (S)

entry.summary: I’m so behind on these reviews I’m gonna cry. I’m also gonna cry because all the crosswalk buttons near Station Square were pretty shitty. Visual appeal: ★★★☆☆ 3/5 The paint job is decent. The button is cute. Feel: ★★☆☆☆ 2/5 Pretty unnoteworthy. Sounds: ★☆☆☆☆ 1/5 None. ☹️ Overall: ★★☆☆☆ 2/5

entry.title: Burgers and Ice Cream
entry.summary: Last Friday I was on a mission to get a taste of the new ice cream flavor at Millie’s, white chocolate with Stanley prune plum. As a result, my roommate and I went down to the border of Shadyside and East Liberty for dinner and dessert.
